info.description:
This is REST API documentation of the Spring Petclinic backend. If authentication is enabled, when calling the APIs use admin/admin

Contact Support:

item.name: Test PetTypes

request.description:
Given that there are 12 pettypes
  When I get the full pettypes list
  Then I expect that list to have 12 pettypes in it

As a employee
  I want to add new PetTypen name
  So that we can add new PetType name

As a employee
   I want to Fail to add new PetType
   So that the new Pet Type will not be displayed at of the Pet Type's list

exec: pm.test("Can retrieve by pettype id", function () {

request.description:
As a employee
  I want to retrieve by Id of PetType
  So that i can find the pettype by id

As a employee
  I want to update PetType
  So that we can  update our PetTypes List

As a employee
  I want to fail to update PetType name
  So that The updated pet Type name will not be displayed at the end of the Pet type's list

As a employee
  I want to delete  PetType name
  So that The specific PetType will be disappear from the end of the Pet Type's list
